output.dependency: The unique identifier for each movie (first column) likely determines the details of the movie's title (second column), implying that each identifier corresponds to a specific title.
The year the movie was released (third column) is often associated with the date of release (fourth column), suggesting that the year provides a temporal context for the more specific release date.
The director (fifth column) is likely associated with the primary actor (seventh column), indicating that the director may also contribute to or influence the casting of main characters.
The language of the movie (ninth column) is often determined by the country (tenth column) where it is categorized, suggesting a dependency where the language chosen reflects the country of origin.
The genre of the movie (fifteenth column) might shape the location (sixteenth column) described in the movie, indicating that certain genres might be more likely to use specific settings.
